International AI Benefit Sharing

This document explores options and motivations for international AI benefit sharing, discussing various approaches to ensure equitable distribution of AI benefits globally. The authors propose a framework for international cooperation, including the establishment of a global governance structure, development of standards and guidelines, and creation of a multilateral agreement on AI benefit sharing. They also discuss the role of non-state actors, such as civil society organizations and private companies, in promoting AI benefit sharing. The document highlights the need for greater transparency, accountability, and inclusivity in AI decision-making processes to ensure that benefits are shared fairly among all stakeholders.
